Title: Establishes a caregiver tax credit and a family caregiver reimbursement program
Summary: Establishes a caregiver tax credit of up to six thousand dollars and a family caregiver reimbursement program to offset out-of-pocket spending by family caregivers.
LawCode: Amd ยง606, Tax L; add ยง221, Eld L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to establishing a caregiver tax credit; and to amend the elder law, in relation to establishing a family caregiver reimbursement program
